FuncDef: This command configures ISID policies for individual ISIDs or ISID ranges in a B-VPLS using SPBM. The ISIDs may belong to I-VPLS services or may be static-isids defined on this node. Multiple entry statements are allowed under aisid-policy. ISIDs that are declared as static do not require andisid-policyunless the ISIDs are not to be advertised.
